input.sentences: i spent all week on my costume and i showed up at the party ready .
there were a lot of other people there .
everyone wanted to take a picture of my costume .
everyone was very impressed with it .
afterward there was a fight over my costume .
output.sentences: This week they spent time getting ready for the halloween costume party
These people liked halloween a lot
They took pictures of each costume on halloween night
The judges were impressed and picked a winner
there was a fight about which costume was better afterward
